name: OperatorPlease_GGJ2018
description:
Here is a cleaned up version of our submission for the Global GameJam 2018 held at Merge VR!

The theme this year was "Transmission"

Operator Please is an homage to Paper's Please, set in a mid-20th century switch operators workspace. The catch with this particular unit, is that it allows the operator to hear every conversation the connect. But its just a harmless malfunction. There's nothing wrong with a little snooping, right?

Credits:

Programmers- Sarah Richmond, Alicia Baum, Curtis Vaughn 

Musician/SFX - Jamail Chachere 

2D Art - John Ledesma 

3D Art - Ryan Tabatabai (sirtabatabai.com)

Thanks a ton for checking us out! We look forward to Jamming again next year!
